Title: Episode 8
Plot: In preparation for her wedding to Frank, Sheila commissions the building of a conservatory in her back yard - but she suddenly remembers her first husband is buried under the patio. Veronica's last stab at IVF on the NHS fails, so she hatches a macabre plan to raise cash for private treatment.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Trevor Williams, Jake McDonald, Margaret Henshaw, Maggie Fox
